text: Ružić may refer to: == Places == * Ružić, Croatia, a village and a municipality in the Šibenik-Knin County, Croatia * Ružić (Vladičin Han), a village in southern Serbia :See also: Ružići (plural form) == People == * Tomislav Ružić (born 1979), Croatian basketball player * Milan Ružić (1955–2014), Croatian football player * Branko Ružić (1919–1997), Croatian painter, sculptor and professor * Branko Ružić (born 1975), Serbian politician * Dushan Ruzic (born 1982), Australian baseball pitcher * Jovan Ružić (1898–1973), Serbian footballer Category:Croatian-language surnames
title: Ružić
